Donia Massoud (amụrụ na 2 Mee 1979) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agụ egwu.
A mụrụ Massoud ma zụlite ya na Alexandria
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu, ọ kwagara Cairo nke mere ka ndị mụrụ ya nwee mwute
Massoud chọpụtara ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri na Cairo, na-aghọ onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-eme ihe nkiri.
N'oge mmalite afọ 2000, Massoud nọrọ afọ atọ na-eme njem n'Ijipt na-anakọta akụkọ ọdịnala na egwu
O mere ndekọ nke abụ ọdịnala ma nweta ohere n'agbamakwụkwọ na ememe obodo
O juru ya anya na ọtụtụ n'ime egwu ahụ na-ekwu maka ahụmịhe ụmụ nwanyị, na-akọwa ọtụtụ abụ dị ka ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ihe rụrụ arụ
Massoud wepụtara abọm na 2009, Mahatet Masr, na egwu ya kachasị ewu ewu "Betnadeeny Tany Leeh" na-ajụ ihe mere enyi nwoke ochie ji akpọ ya kemgbe ọ chọtara onye ọ hụrụ n'anya ọhụrụ
Ọ gara njem na-eme egwu na Africa, Europe, na Eshia, na-akpọ ngwá egwú ọdịnala yana ịbụ abụ.
Na mgbakwunye na egwu ya, Massoud sonyeere otu ihe nkiri Al-Warsha
Ọ na-ewere egwu dị ka ụdị nka yiri nke nka ihe nkiri
E jiri ọnụnọ ya tụnyere nke Soad Hosny
Massoud emeela ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na usoro telivishọn na Egypt na Sweden, na Arabic na Bekee. Ọrụ ya gụnyere ihe nkiri Galteny Mogremen (2006), In the Heliopolis Flat (2007) na Genenet al asmak (2008).
N'afọ 2015, Massoud mere esemokwu maka egbugbu n'azụ ya nke na-agụ, "Obi m na Chineke na-ese okwu".
